Convert USD to CAD (using crypto2)

Source: R/USD2CAD.R
USD2CAD_crypto2.Rd

This function allows you to convert USD to CAD. crypto2 crypto2 now only return USD rates, so CAD rates are not available anymore... See: https://github.com/sstoeckl/crypto2/blob/master/NEWS.md#crypto-200

"fiat_list() has been modified and no longer delivers all available currencies and precious metals (therefore only USD and Bitcoin are available any more)."

Usage

USD2CAD_crypto2(
  data,
  start.date = "2020-01-01",
  end.date = lubridate::now("UTC"),
  conversion = "USD",
  currency = "CAD",
  force = FALSE
)

Arguments

data

The data

start.date

What date to start reporting prices for.

end.date

What date to end reporting prices for.

conversion

What to convert to

currency

What to convert from

force

Whether to force recreating list.prices even though it already exists (e.g., if you added new coins or new dates).

Value

A data frame, with the following columns: date, CAD.rate.
